name: Legendary
description: There's a price of becoming famous.

modifiers.name: of Diamond
modifiers.description: Very precious and hard, but also very brittle.

modifiers.name: of Neodymium twin
modifiers.description: Shows very rare behaviour similar to a very rare metal.

modifiers.name: of Schipnosis tree
modifiers.description: From the origin of mankind, one of the toughtest wood to preserve life itself.

modifiers.name: of the Peek
modifiers.description: The ones over the top has nothing more to discover and feels distant to everyone.

modifiers.name: of the Gangrenous Wounds
modifiers.description: So much meat means so much to lose.

modifiers.name: of the Gluey body
modifiers.description: So much meat means so much to lose.

modifiers.name: with Spiritual Sponge
modifiers.description: Those crystals behaves like batteries, vibrating in a misty way, nice and mysterious, but carrying them ome makes me so tired...

modifiers.name: of the Oniric Flow
modifiers.description: There's no need to trap spiritual energy if You are already connected to the source.

modifiers.name: with Mystical Amplifier
modifiers.description: This mysterious device attached to it, infused with magical power, syphon Your will, but granting You a forbidden power.

modifiers.name: Blood Powered
modifiers.description: Blood for blood! I want yours!.

modifiers.name: of Obsessive Nenia
modifiers.description: The mouth never stops, constantly spitting out words with no will or awareness at all, but Gods are listening and replying to those calls for helps.

modifiers.name: of Pain
modifiers.description: Suffer on me, suffer on you!

modifiers.name: of Reflexes
modifiers.description: A surviving-prone ability with a cost.

modifiers.name: of Fear of Fight
modifiers.description: You prefer to not fight, also to not being hit as well.

modifiers.name: of Slime
modifiers.description: You can recover quickly to injuries, but it makes you very soft.

modifiers.name: of Lizard's Tail
modifiers.description: You can recover to injuries, but it makes you fearfull.

modifiers.name: of Starfish
modifiers.description: You can recover to injuries, but it makes you soft and slow.

modifiers.name: of Studying
modifiers.description: Knowledge requires hours of hard work
